name: WKInterfaceMap
desc: An interface element that displays a noninteractive map for the location you specify.

items.name: func setVisibleMapRect(MKMapRect)
items.desc: Changes the map’s visible region to the specified map rectangle.

items.name: func setRegion(MKCoordinateRegion)
items.desc: Changes the map’s visible region to the specified coordinate region.

items.name: func addAnnotation(CLLocationCoordinate2D, with: UIImage?, centerOffset: CGPoint)
items.desc: Displays the specified image on top of the map.

items.name: func addAnnotation(CLLocationCoordinate2D, withImageNamed: String?, centerOffset: CGPoint)
items.desc: Displays an image from the WatchKit app’s bundle on top of the map.

items.name: func addAnnotation(CLLocationCoordinate2D, with: WKInterfaceMapPinColor)
items.desc: Adds a pin to the map at the specified location.

items.name: func removeAllAnnotations()
items.desc: Removes all annotations from the map.

items.name: func setShowsUserLocation(Bool)
items.desc: Sets whether the map shows the user’s current location.

items.name: func setShowsUserHeading(Bool)
items.desc: Sets whether the map shows the user heading.

items.name: enum WKInterfaceMap.UserTrackingMode
items.desc: Modes for tracking the user’s location on the map.
